start.text: Hi! You must be that infamous Fish that inspires oil rigs and reunites hamster families!

start1.text: Very glad to meet you! How can I help you?

answer.text: Yeah, I heard about your family. Im really sorry for what happened, it is partially my fault...............

answer1.text: You know what we could do? I've been thinking about retiring soon...

answer2.text: And I've heard a lot of good things about you. So..

answer3.text: I was thinking about giving you my position...
